name: launch (zzox)
description:
Controls:

Move in ball: Left/Right or A/D

Move in air: Up/Down or W/S 

Toggle open closed: Z or SPACE or TAB

Quick restart level: R

Source code available here: https://github.com/zzox/haxejam-winter-2021

Using: 

Haxeflixel: https://haxeflixel.com

Echo: https://austineast.dev/echo/ Physics Engine

Ableton Live 10: https://ableton.com

Aseprite: https://aseprite.org

DB16 palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/dawnbringer-16

Miniset font: https://www.azfonts.net/load_font/miniset2-regular.html by Bartek Nowak

:)
